name: FigJam: Exploring a New Frontier
description:
Another multiplayer whiteboard app?! No, FigJam can be so much more. Come explore ways to use FigJam to organize and amplify your design process. Our guest speaker Billy Sweetman will take us through an interactive presentation with a lively discussion to follow. What's your favorite way of using FigJam?


Find Billy and Headway on:

• https://billysweetman.com/

• https://twitter.com/sweetdesignman

• https://www.headway.io/

• https://twitter.com/headwayio


Figma community resources mentioned:

• Stickes with voting

• Sticky note variants
